column2: Bringing consumers and merchants together to support schools, sports programs and other needs-based organizations through everyday purchases.

column1: Donate Blood : Time to donate 100 Drops of Blood, Game teach People for Awareness to donating Blood to save life
column2:
The Purpose of this game to give Awareness to people for donating blood

100 Drops of Blood is an easy yet very addicting game. Simply tap and hold to release the Blood into the Blood bags without losing any! See how long you can last in this simple one touch game! Games don't take more than five minutes (unless you're super awesome!) so play them whenever, wherever you are!

Welcome to Zurich: this app gives you informations about lunch tables, german lessons, clothes, medical treatment, legal advice and much more. Many offers are for free for refugees. They are offered by churches, aid organisations and many volunteers.

column1: DoesNotStop - Need Help or Provide Help through Do
column2:
We offer services for those who are in real need and deserve special care due to any type of physical disability. We have experienced that most of them are unable to buy costly products and items. We offer a donee to submit a request by providing necessary information on our website regarding his/ her disability and essential need to overcome the problem.
The donator will be able to see the submitted requests published on our website. Then, donor will make a contact with specific person who submitted a request for donation.

The Deed App aims to increase the ease of giving to the homeless in our communities. The driving idea behind this project is that the homeless are often forgotten and we are trying to lower the barrier of entry for people to connect with and help them.

Here is a brief overview of how our app works: 

-  Homeless participants, or “Deeders” as we have taken to calling them, choose a unique name that identifies them within the app. 
- After creating a simple profile, app users are able to search for these Deeders through an auto-populating search field. 
- The search leads to a profile created for each Deeder (potentially including a picture and self-created story) where users can set a donation amount and easily donate through Paypal via which open in Safari browser.
- When the user touches the donate button they will be redirected to a Safari webpage to complete the transaction.
- At the end of each week, we distribute the donations to the Deeders in the form of food/retail gift cards.
- Additionally, users can track their donations, which would qualify as charitable deductions (501(c)3 Status Pending).
- Users also see other users donations to a Deeder.

CONNECT is a CSR project. It has a global presence via mobile devices or the internet. Our website fills the gap, connecting CSR providers to CSR seekers. CONNECT can adapt to the CSR providers’ budgets, time preferences, geographical location and who they want to donate to. CSR seekers can now get what they actually need, and providers can fill that need. CONNECT simplifies the otherwise lengthy process to just 3 steps.
CONNECT abolishes the time wasted to find a suitable seeker, because it automatically matches the donation to the receiver. While helping thousands of people around the world, we also promote compassion, environmental protection and awareness. CONNECT goes past borders, using one global village: the world.
Our website connects children, people and communities in need of supplies and help to those who are kind and share resources. CONNECT will put a smile on every person it effects.

This application is unique and very easy to find a donor in Ufa without any registrations and "red tape".
Mobile application "BlooDonator-Ufa" - links the people who need blood - those who can give it. Nothing more, no names, only a mobile number and blood group.
The application should be used for its intended purpose, in Russia a free donation. Each user of the system must comply with rules of using the system (in the "Info" tab).
As a donor in our system, people may call you with a request to donate blood.
If you are not available, "the soul" or "Heart", there is no desire to help people, please do not use this app.
